attributes.action: Studio 338 to refund ticket price for the halloweeen event which was cancelled
attributes.background: The sold out 2016 Halloween event that was hosted by Studio 338 was cancelled on the day of the event. Hundreads of ticket holders were notified 3 hours before the event and PROMISED a refund 7-10 days after the event was cancelled. 5 months later and not one person has received a refund
